post.text:
Trump reportedly asked this about nuclear weapons: "If we have them, why can't we use them?"

We can't let him become president.

comment.author: Miranda
comment.text: Hillary Clinton is a "bought and paid for" POLITICIAN, owned by GEORGE SOROS, who by the way is VERY CORRUPT AND EVIL! HE IS LEADER OF A SECRET SOCIETY CALLED, "ILLUMINATI ZIONIST BANKERS" and you can do a WEB SEARCH if you do not believe me! They are DEVIL WORSHIPPERS and have nothing but EVIL planned for this country, PERIOD! We need to come together and defeat this EVIL with a candidate who is not "owned" by this EVIL and that candidate is DONALD TRUMP! He is an OUTSIDER who cares about AMERICA and does NOT want this EVIL "takeover"of AMERICA! HE WANTS TO BRING AMERICA back to being what it was MEANT TO BE! A GOVERNMENT OF THE PEOPLE, BY THE PEOPLE, AND FOR THE PEOPLE! THE FAKE MAINSTREAM MEDIA IS PUTTING OUT "FAKE POLLS" THAT ARE TRYING TO SCARE AND DISCOURAGE PEOPLE FROM VOTING FOR DONALD TRUMP, DO NOT BELIEVE ONE SINGLE WORD OF THIS! THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS ARE SCARED OF DONALD TRUMP, BECAUSE HE IS ONE OF US, NOT A "BOUGHT AND PAID FOR" POLITICIAN LIKE HILLARY CLINTON OR BARRACK OBAMA! HE TRULY CARES PEOPLE!
